remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`方法可用于呈现一个选项按钮控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render an option button control. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要绘制选项按钮，请使用其中一个方法。To draw an option button, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供的各种选项，如绘制文本或图像与选项按钮。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the option button. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，将绘制当前视觉样式的选项按钮。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the option button with the current visual style. 否则为将绘制与经典 Windows 样式的选项按钮。Otherwise, will draw the option button with the classic Windows style. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应自动匹配的操作系统当前视觉样式设置。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 此类将包装的功能设置为公开的元素之一类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写使用的自定义控件方法，以便绘制响应鼠标单击相应的选项按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the method to draw an option button that responds to mouse clicks.
